name: glaciate
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.
